module: Module-level comment: This module implements a memory PHY interface for an SDRAM controller, managing signaling between the controller and SDRAM chips. It handles address/command signals, data read/write operations, and timing/calibration functions. The module uses DDIO for data transfer, integrates DLL for timing, and incorporates OCT controls. It includes interfaces for configuration, calibration, and debugging, utilizing various sub-modules for reset control, clock management, and I/O operations to achieve its functionality.
